adrFormatAddress: 131 E 38th St, New York, NY 10016-2604, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Shapiro and her staff are wonderful! They're so nice, and they clearly communicated details about my insurance, treatment, and home care. Dr.Shapiro pulled up my x-rays and explained exactly what she was seeing, as well as what the treatment would be. I've never had a dentist go into that level of detail with me before. She truly has a passion for dentistry and it shows!!

She truly has a passion for dentistry and it shows!!

originalText.text: Dr. Shapiro is an excellent dentist and showed me how my previous dentist did not perform work to the highest standards. She is the most qualified out there and the staff is kind. I highly recommend and happy I switched dentists.

text.text: Dr. Shapiro is an excellent dentist and showed me how my previous dentist did not perform work to the highest standards. She is the most qualified out there and the staff is kind. I highly recommend and happy I switched dentists.

originalText.text:
The doctor is very experienced and knowledgeable. She always fix any dental  problems I had. She explains you everything before doing any job.
Her always good mood makes you feel comfortable. I strongly recommend this doctor to everyone.

originalText.text: Love Dr. Shapiro. Extremely articulate, attentive, and kind. Never over prescribes dental work. She listens like she cares, and explains dental workings both extremely clearly and precisely yet also in understandable terms.

text.text: Love Dr. Shapiro. Extremely articulate, attentive, and kind. Never over prescribes dental work. She listens like she cares, and explains dental workings both extremely clearly and precisely yet also in understandable terms.

originalText.text: Dr. Shapiro is excellent. Kind, patient and caring. She explains everything every step of the way. Her warm, welcoming and gentle demeanor puts you at ease. Hard to find quality dentists with magnificent bedside manners. Everyone at the practice is also very kind. Front desk is easy to get a hold of. Easy to make appointments. Came here for the first time last year. Second time this yr. Will continue to come back. Found my forever dentist.
